ingredients.ingredient: ¾ cup freshly grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese

cookingTips: Brush wonton wrappers lightly with egg white to help cheese and herbs stick
Bake at 375°F for 8-10 minutes until crispy and golden; watch closely as they brown quickly
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How do I make crispy, crunchy chips from wonton wrappers? What's the best way to season and bake them?
